mdRecord.dcterms:title: President Herbert Hoover at Mount Vernon, February 22, 1932
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: International News Photos, Inc.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of President Hoover approaching the west front of the Mansion at Mount Vernon. Accompanying Hoover are military personnel, MVLA Superintendent Col. Dodge, First Lady Mrs. Hoover and other members of his official party. All are present to celebrate the bicentennial ceremony commemorating the 200th anniversary of the birth of George Washington.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hoover, Herbert, 1874-1964
Hoover, Lou Henry, 1874-1944
Dodge, Harrison Howell, 1852-1937
